_header: Riches are gotten with labor holden with fear

BLHar2321.Transcription: Riches are gotten with labor holden with feare& lost with greyfe & excessiue care
BLHar2321.Note: Added to right margin by a later hand.
BLHar2321.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.208.
